TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyPath extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作資料結構，用以將屬性描述為另一個屬性下或擁有者型別下的路徑。

span.span: Implements a data structure for describing a property as a path below another property, or below an owning type.

summary.span: 屬性路徑會用於物件的資料繫結，以及分鏡腳本與時間表的動畫。

span.span: Property paths are used in data binding to objects, and in storyboards and timelines for animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含字串，以及相依性屬性的清單插入字串。This class contains a string , and list of dependency properties that are the into the string . 支援兩種模式的行為： supports two modes of behavior: **來源模式**描述做為其他作業的來源屬性路徑。**Source mode** describes a path to a property that is used as a source for some other operation. 此模式由類別，以支援資料繫結。This mode is used by the class to support data binding. **目標模式**描述此屬性，將會設定為 目標屬性的路徑。**Target mode** describes a path to a property that will be set as a target property. 此模式會使用以支援分鏡腳本與時間軸的 setter 的動畫。This mode is used by animation in support of storyboard and timeline setters. 比方說，`Background.Opacity`是兩個步驟的路徑。For instance, `Background.Opacity` is a two-step path. 此路徑所示： 首先，尋找`Background`物件，屬性取得的值物件的`Background`屬性設定為，，，然後取得的值`Opacity`該物件的屬性。This path implies: first, find the `Background` property of an object, get the value object that the `Background` property is set to, and then get the value of the `Opacity` property on that object. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object parameter) cil managed

param.name: parameter
param.span: 屬性路徑，描述到 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 屬性的路徑或為單一相依性屬性。

span.span: A property path that either describes a path to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property, or a single dependency property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式有兩個完全不同的使用方式取決於它是否使用繫結，或分鏡腳本目標的目標模式逐步執行屬性路徑的來源模式屬性路徑。This constructor has two completely different usages depending on whether it is being used for a source-mode property path for a binding, or for a target-mode single-step property path for a storyboard target. 如果使用這繫結的來源模式`parameter`字串，表示屬性名稱，或可以是字串，描述中的屬性"逐步"路徑[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]正做為來源之物件的物件模型繫結。If using this in source mode for a binding, `parameter` is a string representing a property name, or can be a string that describes a "step-through" path to the property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object model of the object that is being used as the source for a binding. 繫結屬性路徑，識別 「 步驟 」 的字元是句點 （.）。For a binding property path, the character that identifies a "step" is a dot (.). 也支援索引子 （包括多個索引子和型別差異） 的參考。Indexer references (including multiple indexers, and type differentiation) are also supported. 如需詳細資訊，明確地使用字串的語法上資訊，請參閱。For more details on the syntax of the string as specifically used by the object, see . 做為繫結來源屬性不需要相依性屬性。A property used as a binding source need not be a dependency property. 如果繫結更新雙向的參考的屬性必須是讀寫。If the binding updates two-way, the property referenced must be read-write. 也請注意繫結目標沒有相依性屬性。Also note that the binding target does have to be a dependency property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For details, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如果使用這分鏡腳本目標，逐步執行路徑的目標模式`parameter`通常會當做型別。If using this in target mode for a single-step path for a storyboard target, `parameter` is generally provided as type . 您也可以指定的字串。You can also specify a string that is the . 任一種評估相同的結果，因為它會在內部儲存為字串。Either of these evaluate to the same result, because it is stored internally as a string. 所提供會轉換成字串，以透過。A provided is converted to a string through . 相依性屬性支援限定的命名格式，因此您可以指定*typeName*。*propertyName*限定到相依性屬性名稱的字串建構函式程式碼中的。The supports a qualified naming format for dependency properties, so you can specify a *typeName*.*propertyName* qualified dependency property name string to the constructor in code. 相依性屬性識別碼的完整的路徑是不同的概念，而複雜的路徑。The qualified path to the dependency property identifier is a different concept than a complex path. 複雜路徑改為使用建立建構函式。A complex-path should instead be created with the constructor.

summary.span: 使用提供的路徑語彙基元 (Token) 字串和參數，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with the provided pathing token string and parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此簽章通常僅用於目標模式複雜路徑的使用方式。This signature is generally only used for target-mode usages with complex paths. 這個建構函式支援`params`針對`pathParameters`建構函式引數。This constructor supports `params` for the `pathParameters` constructor argument. 因此，您也可以指定的內容`pathParameters`為一系列的逗號分隔的建構函式引數所填入的陣列，而不需要維度陣列，並於其中填入它與`pathParameters`項目。Therefore you can specify the contents of `pathParameters` as a series of comma-separated constructor arguments that populate the array, rather than needing to dimension an array and then populate it with the `pathParameters` items. 您指定每個項目必須是下列類型之一： ， ， 。Each item you specify must be one of the following types: , , . 如需有關參數的需求的詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more information on the requirements of the parameters, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定描述路徑的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that describes the path.
The string that describes the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性中所包含的字串有三個完全不同的意義，取決於是否用於分鏡腳本目標，目標模式逐步執行屬性路徑的繫結，或複雜的來源模式屬性路徑分鏡腳本目標路徑。The string contained in this property has three completely different meanings depending on whether a is being used for a source-mode property path for a binding, for a target-mode single-step property path for a storyboard target, or for a complex path for a storyboard target. 如果使用這繫結的來源模式字串，表示屬性名稱，或可以是字串，描述中的屬性"逐步"路徑[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]正做為來源之物件的物件模型繫結。If using this in source mode for a binding, is a string representing a property name, or can be a string that describes a "step-through" path to the property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object model of the object that is being used as the source for a binding. 繫結屬性路徑，識別 「 步驟 」 的字元是句點 （.）。For a binding property path, the character that identifies a "step" is a dot (.). 也支援索引子 （包括多個索引子和型別差異） 的參考。Indexer references (including multiple indexers, and type differentiation) are also supported. 如需詳細資訊，明確地使用字串的語法上資訊，請參閱。For more details on the syntax of the string as specifically used by the object, see . 做為繫結來源屬性不需要相依性屬性。A property used as a binding source need not be a dependency property. 如果更新雙向繫結的屬性來源必須是讀寫。If the binding updates two-way, the property source must be read-write. 也請注意繫結目標沒有相依性屬性。Also note that the binding target does have to be a dependency property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For details, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如果使用這分鏡腳本目標，逐步執行路徑的目標模式是字串*typeName*。*propertyName*限定相依性屬性名稱的字串。If using this in target mode for a single-step path for a storyboard target, is a string that is a *typeName*.*propertyName* qualified dependency property name string. 如果使用這分鏡腳本目標，複雜路徑是描述所提供之各種物件的關聯性的語彙基元化的字串格式。If using this for a complex path for a storyboard target, is a tokenized string format that describes the relationships of the various objects given in the . - 此格式指定陣列中的每個項目所括號括住的項目陣列索引。Each item in the array is specified in this format by the array index for the item enclosed in parentheses. 例如，若要指定陣列中的第一個項目，字串語彙基元是`(0)`。For example, to specify the first item in the array, the string token is `(0)`. - 點 （.） 所指定項目 （在路徑中的 「 步驟 」） 之間的關聯性。Relationships between items ("steps" in the path) are specified by a dot (.). 之前的點屬性是第一個步驟在路徑中之後, 的屬性是第二個步驟中，以此類推 （您可以指定兩個以上的步驟）。The property forward of the dot is the first step in the path, the property after is the second step, and so on (you can specify steps beyond two). 鏈結中的最後一個步驟一律表示要繪製之屬性。The last step in the chain always represents the property being animated. - 使用索引子語法，以方括弧括住索引存取集合屬性中的項目 （[和]）。Items within collection properties are accessed with an indexer syntax, with the index within square brackets ([ and ]). 這個索引子是附加至語彙基元，表示此屬性。The indexer is additive to the token representing the property. 比方說，以下是兩個步驟的路徑，使用的語彙基元的組合，在第一個步驟中指定該屬性的集合內的第二個項目： `(0)[1].(1)` 。For example, the following is a two-step path, with the token combination in the first step specifying the second item from within the collection of that property: `(0)[1].(1)` . 您無法使用索引子上鏈結; 中的最後一個屬性您無法以動畫顯示的實際集合的位置，您必須建立該物件上的屬性的動畫。You cannot use an indexer on the last property in the chain; you cannot animate the actual collection position, you must animate a property on that object. 路徑字串通常透過建構函式所建立：繫結或單一步驟分鏡腳本目標，簽章多步驟分鏡腳本目標的簽章。The path string for a is typically established through the constructors: the signature for bindings or single-step storyboard targets, the signature for multi-step storyboard targets. **XAML 中：** 當您使用說明中的屬性參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，如屬性值，您指定的字串第一次由型別轉換子 ()。**XAML:** When you use a to describe a property reference in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an attribute value, the string that you specify is first handled by a type converter (). 這個型別轉換子然後處理字串，並根據其語法會呼叫其中一種建構函式簽章。This type converter then processes the string and based on its syntax will call one of the constructor signatures. 處理屬性值的型別轉換子透過這種間接方式通常是您的使用方式中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而不是宣告物件項目，然後將特定值如套用屬性和.This indirection through the type converter handling an attribute value is generally how you use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than declaring a object element and then applying specific values to attributes such as and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [PropertyPath XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For more information, see [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 成員類型未通常設定在 direct 中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法。Members of the type are not typically set in a direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PathParameters As Collection(Of Object)

summary.span: 取得要使用的參數之清單，這些參數會在路徑參考索引參數時使用。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters to use when the path refers to indexed parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常透過建構函式所建立。The properties for a are typically established through the constructors. 設定，則建構函式會格外方便因為`pathParameters`建構函式引數會指定為`params`，這表示您不需要建立或維度，讓您以建構陣列。For setting , the constructor is particularly convenient because the `pathParameters` constructor argument is designated as `params`, meaning that you do not need to create or dimension an array for construction. 您只需指定陣列的每個成員，做為額外的參數。You simply specify each member of the array as an additional parameter. 如果做為目標的最後一個屬性是類型，值將會複製。If the final property that is the target is a type, that value will be cloned. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 分鏡腳本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For details, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 實際評估的屬性鏈結是由分鏡腳本動畫機制執行。The actual evaluation of the property chain is performed by the storyboard animation mechanisms. 在層級，不會執行驗證以確定路徑的步驟完全連線。At the level, no validation is performed to make sure that the steps of the path connect at all. 比方說，您可以在其中建構屬性的路徑第一個步驟中，和作為第二個步驟。For instance, you can construct a property path that has as the first step, and as the second step. 不過，這類屬性路徑會實際套用做為目標，如果由於失敗的筆刷類型，會填滿沒有屬性。But such a property path would fail if actually applied as a target, because the Brush type that fills does not have a property. 無效的屬性路徑會以無訊息模式失敗。Invalid property paths fail silently. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[分鏡腳本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). **XAML 中：** 當您使用說明中的屬性參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，如屬性值，您指定的字串第一次由型別轉換子 ()。**XAML:** When you use a to describe a property reference in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an attribute value, the string that you specify is first handled by a type converter (). 這個型別轉換子然後處理字串，並根據其語法會呼叫其中一種建構函式簽章。This type converter then processes the string and based on its syntax will call one of the constructor signatures. 處理屬性值的型別轉換子透過這種間接方式通常是您的使用方式中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而不是宣告物件項目，然後將特定值如套用屬性和.This indirection through the type converter handling an attribute value is generally how you use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than declaring a object element and then applying specific values to attributes such as and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [PropertyPath XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md)。For more information, see [PropertyPath XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/propertypath-xaml-syntax.md). ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 成員類型未通常設定在 direct 中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法。Members of the type are not typically set in a direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax. 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks.
